alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Madison; Richland; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued April 05 at 4:07PM CDT until April 05 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 130 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA FRANKLIN MADISON RICHLAND TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 24 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW COPIAH HINDS HOLMES HUMPHREYS LEAKE MADISON RANKIN YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI WINSTON IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, ANGUILLA, BELZONI, BRANDON, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, COLUMBUS, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DELHI, DURANT, EUPORA, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, GOODMAN, GRENADA, HARRISONBURG, HAZLEHURST, ISOLA, JACKSON, JONESVILLE, KOSCIUSKO, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MADISON, MATHISTON, MAYERSVILLE, NATCHEZ, NEWELLTON, NORTH CARROLLTON, PEARL, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, RAYVILLE, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, ST. JOSEPH, STARKVILLE, TALLULAH, TCHULA, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WEIR, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, WEST POINT, WINNSBORO, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
